mapper.update:
update t_user_collections
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del = #{del,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user_collections set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del = #{del,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT uc.object_id, uc.create_time, c.name as course_name FROM t_user_collections uc, t_course c WHERE uc.object_id = c.id and uc.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY uc.create_time DESC
